definitions.definition: The topmost point or surface of a thing ; the apex , the peak .

subdefinitions.definition: The highest point of a hill , mountain , or similar geographical feature .
examples: In summer, it is possible to hike to the summit of Mount Shasta.

subdefinitions.definition: A vertex of a polygon or polyhedron .
The highest point of a canal , railway , road , etc.

Synonym of anther ( “ the pollen - bearing part of the stamen of a flower ” ) or ( rare ) stigma ( “ the sticky part of a flower that receives pollen during pollination ” ) . ( crystallography , rare ) One of the two vertices of a crystal with a rhombohedral shape where the angles of each face are equal ; also, the highest point of a crystal with a pyramidal or tetrahedral shape.
The highest point of achievement , development , etc., that can be reached ; the acme , the pinnacle .

The highest level of political leadership . ( by extension ) An assembly or gathering of the leaders of countries to discuss issues of international significance ; also ( loosely ) , an important or high-level gathering or meeting .
examples: They met for an international summit on environmental issues.

main_definition: The topmost point or surface of a thing ; the apex , the peak .
